title: tobi4255
author: tobi4255
created_time: June 28, 2023, 11:48:03 AMLast edit: June 28, 2023, 01:09:12 PM by tobi4255
content: Official & Legit Exchange and Withdrawal PlatformBOOMCHANGE.com Decentralised Cryptocurrency Exchange       WEBSITE | YOUTUBE | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM |  TELEGRAM- You can withdraw from Crypto to Paypal - You can withdraw from Crypto to Skrill- You can withdraw from Crypto to Payoneer- You can withdraw from Crypto to Perfect Money    Boomchange is an exchange of cryptocurrencies. An online marketplace platform called a cryptocurrency exchange allows users to purchase and sell cryptocurrencies. The Boomchange is also a withdrawal method of funds. There are many online exchanges, but this crypto exchange is different with its easy usage and low fees. You can do your transactions without registration. Official transaction processing time is 10-60 minutes on the Boomchange swapping platform. Please note that some transfers may last a little longer, because of different network specifications. Aims Currently, any user who wants to conduct such a financial transaction can do so through the cryptocurrency exchange. The goal of this platform is to become a really reliable and honest exchanger that can process quick and trustworthy transfers. The Exchange has thousands of active users. The Boomchange offers mentioned services about two years.Security and FeesBefore processing your transaction please carefully check all pairs and fees. Explore each pair exchange percentage. Boomchange fees are 2-6%, but some payment systems have their own transactional fees and that are different vary by country or region. For example, PayPal has 1$ fixed fee in many countries.Benefits of Boomchange - As an online exchange swapping is very convenient - Fast and easy transactional process- The opportunity to buy and sell a wide variety of cryptocurrencies- Security of transactional transparency- Diverse payment methods and systems- Worldwide transfers  This innovative online system will give people the perfect space for swapping.https://boomchange.comDisclaimer: As a presenter for this project on the forum, I want to clarify that I have no personal association with it. Please conduct thorough research before making any decisions or investments. Your due diligence is crucial for assessing the credibility and suitability of any project mentioned.

comments.author: smushi6
comments.body: My swap of Btc to Eth went smoothly using Boomchange. In other platforms I couldn't find direct swap for these pairs or in some places I could do that with the high rates and commissions. Now I can do my favourite pair-swap in an easy way with low rates.

comments.author: shaimon968
comments.body: Extremely effective and I would like to share my satisfactionI was drawn to this site in the first place because of their fast transfers and quick replies to my calls and messages. For my daily activities the website is useful. For the first time when I used Boomchange I did step by step as they show on their videos and after that one I can easily use the website features. I liked exchange processing steps and got my funds without any difficulties. Only I would like to have any application for these services, I think it would be easier to use.

comments.author: Sajibchakroborty
comments.body: I heard about this online exchange from my friend which has already tried to exchange and he shared with his experience with me. Now I would like to share my experience to everyone who in somehow dealing with cryptocurrences. This website worked for me 100%

comments.body: Reliable platform that is easy to use . Although I was initially dubious, it works. Exchange rates are always competitive. I’ll surely continue to use for my next deals.

comments.author: Sujon07
comments.body: I was having some difficulties and looking at exchange from Matic to Skrill. Fortunately was found this perfect website. I am extremely happy because the company do their work professionally.

comments.author: blogclaim
comments.body: I want to share with my fantastic experience With Boomchange. I sent to the address of Boomchange wrong amount. I mentioned 0,05 Eth but unintentionally sent 0,08 to their address. I didn't know what to do. I tried to contact with them. I called by their phone numbers and introduced my issue, then I got an advice to wend the screenshot of my transaction and mention the order number. I did this via email and also contacted them by chat. After a minute i Got an answer they tryin to solve my issue. so they identify my transaction by that details like order number and transaction details which was dipsplayed on my crypto wallet  transaction history. Then they asked me if its better to get my extra payment by Ethereum or USdt. I preffered to get with USDt and after sending my USDT TRC20 address to them I got an email notification. The email meesage informed me that My identificaiton  was managed and I got my 0,04 Eth to my wallet. The customer support was so helpful.

comments.author: fahim-uddin
comments.body: I have been looking for a way to withdraw my altcoins and get funds into my wallet maybe. I found Boomchange and saw that it's will be possible to withdraw funds to my Payoneer account. I am so glad to have this option and opportunity

comments.author: mahfuj28
comments.body: I never had issues when I send crypto through Boomchange. Transafers goin so fast. Usually I get my funds during 10 minutes, only 1 time there was a transction which took an hour. I wrote to the support team and they said to me that BTC transactions sometimes takes more time than usuall and after 10 minutes I got. Happy to find such a great service

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Come on guys, it's not obvious with that consecutive praise and vouch from newbie accounts. I don't know if there's currently a running bounty for this exchange but that's not a good incentive if you've got any of those. And I think that you need to go through again with your label. Because these days, whoever is saying that they're legit and safe, it's the opposite thought that's coming to everyone. Well, I am not saying anything against your exchange because I want to see a lot of it compete so that we as users got a lot of choices.

comments.author: Bitcoadvice
comments.body: This is scam and the cybercriminal created multiple accounts to promote this fraudulent fake crypto exchange.You can find more about the Crypto SCAM Boomchange here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454622.0____The article discusses a forum thread on Bitcointalk.org that addresses the topic of a scam involving a cryptocurrency exchange called Boomchange. Users on the forum have identified suspicious activities and shared information about the alleged cyber criminal behind the scam, who is believed to be an Armenian residing in Yerevan.The thread reveals that the scammer has been using multiple IP addresses, including 37.252.93.99, which is associated with their iPhone. The hosting provider of the scam exchange is identified as Amarutu Technology, operating under the domain Koddos.net. Users are encouraged to report any abuse related to Boomchange to abuse@koddos.net or through a ticket on their website.The article also highlights the scammer's tactics, such as using search engine optimization (SEO) to promote their fake services and purchasing positive online reviews on platforms like Trustpilot and Sitejabber. The criminal leverages various social media platforms, including YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, Reddit, and Twitter, to promote the fraudulent scheme.Furthermore, the author points out that additional information about this scam can be found on websites dedicated to reporting Bitcoin abuse, such as Chainabuse and Bitcoinabuse. The article provides several links to specific reports and domains associated with Boomchange.Overall, the article serves as a warning to potential victims and encourages readers to be cautious when dealing with Boomchange and report any suspicious activities related to the scam.
